item.description: SINGLES GAME NIGHT at Gail Fuller’s cozy home in Bristol at 7 pm. This is a great event to meet new people and socialize in a relaxed warm comfortable setting. We’ll eat, play games, or just hang out and visit. Bring your favorite game, a munchie or dessert to share, and dress casual. Admission $10. To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 35 Anthony Dr: I 84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington Street, at 2nd light left onto Northwest Drive, at end right onto Camp Street, left onto O'Sullivan Drive, at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Avenue, left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Game Night
